page.title: Assistant Chief of the Air Staff

revision.comment: /* Assistant chiefs of the air staff */
revision.text:
The '''Assistant Chief of the Air Staff''' ('''ACAS''') is a senior appointment in the [[Royal Air Force]].
The ACAS post was established in 1985 by eliminating the [[Vice-Chief of the Air Staff (United Kingdom)|Vice Chief of the Air Staff]] and combining the Policy and Operations [[Air Vice-Marshal|two star]] assistant chiefs. In 1992, ACAS became a member of the [[Air Force Board]]. The ACAS is responsible for "Assisting the Chief of the Air Staff in generating a balanced and integrated Royal Air Force capability and for maintaining the fighting effectiveness and morale of the Service including the development of policy."<ref>https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/505524/Air_Sep_15_senior_data.csv/preview</ref> One of the many duties of the ACAS is to sit on the board of the [[United Kingdom Civil Aviation Authority|Civil Aviation Authority]] as a [[non-executive member]].<ref name="RAF - ACAS">{{cite web|title=Assistant Chief of Air Staff (ACAS)|url=http://www.raf.mod.uk/organisation/assistant-chief-of-airstaff.cfm|website=Senior Commanders|publisher=Royal Air Force|accessdate=12 February 2016}}</ref>
==Assistant chiefs of the air staff== *1985 – 1986 [[Anthony Skingsley]] *1987 – 1989 [[Michael Simmons (RAF officer)|Michael Simmons]] *1989 – 1991 [[John Thomson (RAF officer)|John Thomson]] *1991 – 1992 [[Timothy Garden, Baron Garden|Timothy Garden]] *1992 – 1994 [[Anthony Bagnall]] *1994 – 1996 [[Peter Squire]] *1996 – 1998 [[Timothy Jenner]] *1998 – 2000 [[Jock Stirrup]] *2000 – 2003 [[Philip Sturley]] *2003 – 2005 [[David Walker (RAF aircrew officer)|David Walker]] *2005 – 2007 [[Chris Moran]] *27 April 2007 [[Tim Anderson (RAF officer)|Tim Anderson]] *1 March 2010 [[Barry North]]<ref>[http://www.raf.mod.uk/rafcms/mediafiles/9FA1EB3F_5056_A318_A8DBF8B00368CAC7.doc Royal Air Force Air Rank Appointments List 08/09] retrieved 27 October 2009</ref> *5 April 2013 [[Edward Stringer]]<ref>[http://www.raf.mod.uk/rafcms/mediafiles/4AE97FBC_5056_A318_A8F6B65B7AC69810.doc Royal Air Force Air Rank Appointments List 03/13] retrieved 8 May 2013</ref> *23 January 2015 [[Richard Knighton]]<ref>{{cite web|title=AIR RANK AND COMMAND APPOINTMENTS LIST 11.14|url=http://www.raf.mod.uk/organisation/senior-appointments.cfm|website=Senior Appointments|publisher=Royal Air Force|accessdate=22 April 2015|date=9 December 2014}}</ref>
